subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]The 4 Horsemen of the Apocalypse: Are We in a Recession? How to Invest Right Now[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]In this lively and insightful talk, Terri Spath, Founder of Zuma Wealth LLC, will examine the four key indicators that, when taken together, determine the probability of economic recession.  Studying those assessments, Terri will then discuss, evaluate, and debate the most effective ways to position and adjust investments in your portfolio, to adapt to a slow or negative growth environment combined with frothy inflation.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]
You will learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Dynamic%20rules%20for%20stocks%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20and%20when%20to%20adjust%20for%20volatility%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22The%20viability%20of%20fixed-income%20investments%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Outlook%20for%20cryptocurrencies%20(are%20they%20all%20dead%3F)%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20to%20ensure%20investment%20success%20over%20the%20next%2012%20months%20and%20coming%20years%22%7D%5D" icon_border="border_style:none|border_color:%2334d288" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#5e67bb" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2334d288"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Terri Spath, CFA, CFP founded Zuma Wealth LLC in 2021 bringing the expertise that comes with stewarding billions of dollars at some of the largest investment shops, including Franklin Templeton Investments, Mercer Advisors and Sierra Investments.  Terri is a regular guest on CNBC and Bloomberg, a sought-after industry speaker and frequent contributor to numerous publications.  She was recently named a “Top 10 Inspiring Women of 2022” by industry Era Magazine.  Terri has earned the CFA, the CFP, and MBA in Finance from Columbia University, and an AB in Economics from the University of Michigan.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Inflation Surge: Where to Invest Your Money + Pitfalls to Avoid[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Inflation is one of the biggest threats to retirement.  With consumer prices hitting a 40-year high this year, I’m sharing how to invest when inflation is surging and why retirement investors can do to protect their purchasing power.  I’m also sharing three costly mistakes to avoid-mistakes that can derail a retirement plan.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]
You will learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20to%20factor%20inflation%20into%20your%20retirement%20plan%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Where%20to%20invest%20when%20inflation%20is%20surging%20%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Three%20costly%20mistakes%20every%20retirement%20investor%20should%20avoid%22%7D%5D" icon_border="border_style:none|border_color:%2334d288" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#5e67bb" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2334d288"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Taylor R. Schulte, CFP is the founder of Define Financial, a commission-free retirement planning firm specializing in helping people over age 50 lower taxes, invest smarter, and make work optional.  In 2022, Schulte was named the #2 independent financial advisor in the U.S. by Investopedia, and one of the Top Registered Investment Advisors by FA Magazine.  With a passion for education, he hosts an Apple Top 100 retirement podcast called Stay Wealthy and is a regular contributor to publications such as The Wall Street Journal, CNBC, and Kiplinger.  When he’s not perfecting retirement plans, you can find him traveling with his wife and three kids, searching for the next best carne asada burrito, or trying to master Adam Scott’s golf swing.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
